name: COVID Courier
description:
COVID Courier is a web-based runner with procedural levels that puts you in the shoes of a time traveler from the future trying to save humanity from COVID-19. Use your knowledge of physical distancing to deliver your message as quickly as possible.

Don't let anything stand in your way!

We hope to encourage positive behaviors as we run out the end of this pandemic.  Stay safe and healthy!

Visit the website for more info on game mechanics.

COVID Courier | Simcoach Games
